DOC.brief_summary: This survey conduct prepare application material re-examination Pharmaceutical Affairs Law Enforcement Regulation ; aim reconfirm clinical usefulness COZAAR XQ collect safety efficacy information accord Re-examination Regulation New Drugs .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Participant essential hypertension Participant treat COZAAR XQ within local label first time Exclusion criterion : Participant treat COZAAR XQ contract enrollment period Participant contraindication COZAAR XQ accord local label
